news.content:
üìö ThreeFold Update üìö

Recently, we released ThreeFold Grid 2.8.0, which features:

ü§ù Generic VMs Support
üîé ThreeFold Explorer v0.5.1
üë®‚Äçüåæ Farming & Minting Operational Improvements

Not sure what this means? ü§î Scott (who's on a roll this week) took the time to explain the highlights here. Feel free to ask questions!

And you can find the full release notes here.
news.excerpt: Generic VMs support, TF Explorer v0.5.1, and Farming & Minting operational improvements!

previous.title: Update on Testnet for TF Grid 3.0
previous.excerpt: Testnet for TF Grid 3.0 is fully available for testing, both for connecting infrastructure and for deploying workloads!
